website_summaries.verdict: The response towards the Asics Gel Pulse 9 was positive. The underfoot platform received particular praise for being supportive and agreeable. On the other hand, some testers were unhappy with the width profiles. Also, others felt that the interior chamber wasn’t very secure because they experienced accidental shoe removals. Overall, neutral runners considered the Gel Pulse 9 to be a worthy addition to the roster of products in the Asics stable. They also felt that it was a natural progression of the series.
pros: Several testers were happy with the sleek look of the Asics Gel Pulse 9
The underfoot experience was described as comfortable
People have noted that the platform was steady enough to support the underfoot through extended runs
Many purchasers stated that the original list price of the Gel Pulse 9 was already affordable
A handful of those who had plantar fasciitis claimed that this road shoe helped in preventing discomfort or foot strain
Some individuals stated that this running shoe looked and performed better than its predecessors
cons: Some consumers claimed that the width profiles were tighter than what they expected
A few testers felt their heels slipping from the foot-chamber easily

customer_reviews.title: Too small a real letdown on the Gel Pulse series
customer_reviews.text: I own the Gel Pulse 7 & 8s, so I naturally went for the 9. Big mistake. The toebox is too narrow and the shoe is too small; despite sticking to the same size as the previous 2, also my big toes rub against the lining when running. There is an uncomfortable rubbing that has now caused bruising on my ankle and I can barely wear the things, let alone try and run in them. If people where going to go for this I'd recommend going a 1/2 size up from previous ASIC shoes. This is not the fault of the seller and delivery was faultless
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: disaster!
customer_reviews.text: First world disaster, of course. I've been wearing 11.5 ASICS shoes for many years and, within a week, I've sent two pairs back because they are too small. I know that I can get a bigger size, get over it, but there has to be a reason why ASICS has done this. Have they merged USA and UK sizing, which are different? My only option now is to go back to old-fashioned shopping lol
customer_reviews.author: THEWHITLAM

customer_reviews.title: I only ever buy these trainers
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these trainers about three years ago. They are simply great middle of the range working trainers - not posing in the street trainers. Since buying my first pair I now only ever buy these. I play squash five times a week so they get a lot of punishment. For me a pair last about. year which is more than I expect given the usage I get out of them daily. I can’t recommend these highly enough. Service and delivery was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fitted fine, however I had a calf strain after the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a half size bigger after reading other review. The shoe fitted fine, however I had a calf strain after the first run, I believe my running gate changed slightly when using a new shoe and caused the injury. Two weeks rest and a slightly shorter run for a few weeks seems to have solved this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit...
customer_reviews.text: Ended up giving these away, as the fit was just too tight. The ASICS Men's Gt-2000 6 are a much better fit (for the same size!), so I'd recommend those instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are very tight/small I thought it was because ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very tight/small I thought it was because they where new and would stretch as I have had previous Asics running shoes in the same size, however they have not stretched and still feel very tight after 3 weeks of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul50uk

customer_reviews.title: This is a really comfortable shoe. I run about 40 miles a week ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a half size up from my usual 10...bit tight in the toe box at first. I also bought an 11. This is a really comfortable shoe. I run about 40 miles a week on grass, road and trail and I do like these. I recommend a half/.full size up though.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Tight on the toes. Go for a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Size 11 is slightly tight around the big toe and I take an 11 in all my shoes. I’d go for a half size bigger than normal. Good quality, light and durable. The colour is fab but not to everyone’s taste
customer_reviews.author: D.G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a similar pair of trainers worn out by hundreds of miles of walking. These were considerably cheaper and seem set to last equally well. A very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J P.

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have shin splints so getting the right comfortable trainers always seem tricky. These have been great for me haven't had any problems from day one.
customer_reviews.author: abdul

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap shoes, fast delivery. Had read previous reviews and would recommend going up half a size and agree completely. The shoes themselves aren't great but I wasn't expecting much at that price, that said I am coming out of nike vomero so it's more a preference thing than a criticism of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: T Mc Shane

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of size
customer_reviews.text: First time I’ve bought ASICS and they feel like a good shoe. The sizing is a bit on the small side for an 11.
customer_reviews.author: Ian W. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for general training and gym, price varies depending on colour, worth a few extra £ for the gel sole which makes a big difference when running
customer_reviews.author: Muddy Fox

customer_reviews.title: ASICS has changed their sizing system, Order half size more!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews regarding the sizing and thank to that I ordered half size more of my regular ASICS size, they fit fine with that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What have Asics done?
customer_reviews.text: Although not a runner I do wear running shoes a lot and have had various versions of Gel Pulse which have all been excellent. However, it appears that Asics have done something as the shoes have become smaller and narrower and are now downright uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John Bromley

customer_reviews.title: ASICS
customer_reviews.text: This style is too narrow now. Skimping on material? Chose Adidas instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Tall 61

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Can't fault these, both myself and my son run in Gel-Pulse 9 shoes now - plenty of room in the toe box for our wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Accurate fit and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. Sizing is accurate, and he seems very happy with them. He’s not a serious runner, but uses these for a range of casual sports and physical activities.
customer_reviews.author: AshleeV

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than previous Gel Pulse versions
customer_reviews.text: Should've listened to the other reviews and gone up a half size ! Don't think it's a wearing in issue, I have 3 previous generations of the Gel Pulse and this is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly large but good to have some space at the front. Also wide I have space at the top of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Black

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, added half a size as advised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, added half a size as advised. Lots of room in the toe box and tons of cushioning from the sole. Will buy again once I see how they last
customer_reviews.author: Mr Peter G Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good value trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer. Fits well and really comfy. Good value for money.... Done some running in these over all sorts of terrain and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Iain Pead-Jowett

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery, trainers constructed very well as expected of Asics, very pleased, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lawrie

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: Went up half a size after reading reviews and fit ol
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected having previously owned the Pulse 6 & 8. I would describe these as an average running shoe for an average runner and so are perfectly suited to me.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes for this price.
customer_reviews.text: I got size 8 and they were too tight, so I reordered a size 8.5. So much comfortable. For the price, these have been my best Asics running shoes. The soles make u run more efficiently, thus faster. Highly recommend them. I run a lot and these shoes seem ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Undersized!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 43.5, my foot is 43 and those shoes are 1 size too small. will be sending back in few days.
customer_reviews.author: Raghnall

customer_reviews.title: Not quite FIT for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and appearance but feels much smaller than the size on the box. Interestingly there is no obvious size marker on the shoe to check.
customer_reviews.author: Cliffrat

customer_reviews.title: Great road running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Instant improvement to my running, sharp looking. Would recommend to anyone that likes pavement/road running.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Clive Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Reliable as ever..
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. Have been a fan for many years. Tough but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, Quite a bounce to the run, Took 3 mins off my 5k RUN
customer_reviews.author: Mr D.

customer_reviews.title: hole developing in big toe area of left foot
customer_reviews.text: got for running but rarely used due to calf injury but hole developing in big toe area of left foot
customer_reviews.author: Alex Duff

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes very fast delivery, glad i ordered a size up as the shoe is rather tight fit as mentioned in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Siad Ugradar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic running shoes - I used them for the Great North Run this past Sunday, 09/09/18.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycey Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but returned as not normal fit. Need 0.5 size larger than my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: Good running shoes for what I needed. Slightly snug fit but not enough to warrant a different size.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Lambard

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: The shoes had been previously worn which was, to put it mildly, disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Pulse 9 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: These Asics running shoes for men are a long-distance model for runners with neutral movement without misalignment. Running Gel-Pulse 9 shoes made with mesh upper tightly woven, lightweight and breathable with reflective details. The SpEVA midsole and the gel cushioning in the heel area ensure excellent wearing comfort. The Trusstic system is located in the midfoot area. The outer sole is made of robust AHAR + rubber. The Guidance Line ensures good rolling behavior.
feature_bullets: External heel counter - Promotes a firm, locked-in fit.
Reflective details - Increase visibility to passing vehicles.
Removable sockliner - For an extra layer of underfoot comfort.
